item.title: My C++ Programming game!
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

Yz85Racer:

Devcpp compiles with a bunch load of unneeded crap. Apparently.

It is true that the default options dev-c++ uses will produce massive executables, this can easily be customised though (turn debug info off etc).

I think gcc does produce bigger exe’s than, say, the MS compiler for Windows anyway, but it’s not really worth worrying about.

Dev-C++ is a fine IDE.

Read full topic
